New Records: Bowden Francis nearly threw a no-hitter through eight innings, only to be thwarted by Francisco Lindor's home run in the ninth
Key Match Events: Francisco Lindor hit a game-tying solo home run in the ninth inning
The New York Mets scored six runs in the ninth inning to win the game
Post-Match Reflections: Sean Manaea tipped his cap to Bowden Francis across dugouts in the ninth
Mets manager Carlos Mendoza praised Francis's performance
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was attended by 29,399 fans
The win keeps the Mets in playoff position, sitting a half-game up on the Atlanta Braves
